abstract.t: This document describes a file format for the storage of flow data based upon the IPFIX message format. It proposes a set of requirements for flat-file, binary flow data file formats, evaluates flow storage systems presently in use for their conformance to these requirements, then applies the IPFIX message format to these requirements to build a new file format. This IPFIX-based file format is designed to facilitate interoperability and reusability among a wide variety of flow storage, processing, and analysis tools.
